metadata.title: CVE-2019-7326 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: Self - Stored Cross Site Scripting (XSS) exists in ZoneMinder through 1.32.3, allowing an attacker to execute HTML or JavaScript code via a vulnerable 'Host' parameter value in the view console (console.php) because proper filtration is omitted. This relates to the index.php?view=monitor Host Name field.

criterions.comment: zoneminder package in impish is affected and needs fixing.
